front.title: 4map6 Segments for IPv4 Service delivery over IPv6-only underlay networks

abstract.t: This document defines two new types of segments for Segment Routing, i.e., M46S and M46D segments, which are mapping rules based IPv4/IPv6 conversion function running in PE nodes. This segment can be used for IPv4 service delivery over IPv6-only undelay networks.Both M46S and M46D are called 4map6 segments. Both M46S and M46D are called 4map6 segments and run in pairs.
